name: Climb'em
description:
What is Climb'em? 

Climb'em is an endless runner game, where your goal is to climb as many platforms without falling into the spikes below. Points are scored when a platform hits the spikes below,  so try to climb as many as you can to score high! 

How to Play! 

Use the left & right arrow keys to move and use the space bar to jump onto the other platforms. 

Have fun!
